code.description: Meat of bovine animals, fresh or chilled
Meat of swine, fresh, chilled or frozen
Meat of sheep or goats, fresh, chilled or frozen
Meat and edible offal, of the poultry of heading 0105, fresh, chilled or frozen
Other meat and edible meat offal, fresh, chilled or frozen
Live fish
Fish, fresh or chilled, excluding fish fillets and other fish meat of heading 0304
Fish fillets and other fish meat (whether or not minced), fresh, chilled or frozen
Milk and cream, not concentrated nor containing added sugar or other sweetening matter

Yogurt; buttermilk, curdled milk and cream,  kephir and other fermented or acidified milk and cream, whether or not concentrated or containing added sugar or other sweetening matter or flavoured or containing added fruit, nuts or cocoa
Butter
Cheese and curd
Natural honey
Potatoes, fresh or chilled
Tomatoes, fresh or chilled
Onions, shallots, garlic, leeks and other alliaceous vegetables, fresh or chilled
Cabbages, cauliflowers, kohlrabi, kale and similar edible brassicas, fresh or chilled
Lettuce (Lactuca sativa) and chicory (Cichorium spp.), fresh or chilled
Cucumbers and gherkins, fresh or chilled
Leguminous vegetables, shelled or unshelled, fresh or chilled
Other vegetables, fresh or chilled
Apples, pears and quinces, fresh

Bread, pastry, cakes, biscuits and other bakers' wares, whether or not containing cocoa; communion wafers, empty cachets of a kind suitable for pharmaceutical use, sealing wafers, rice paper and similar products
Bread, not containing added honey, eggs, cheese or fruit, and containing by weight in the dry matter state not more than 5 % of sugars and not more than 5 % of fat
Fruit or nut juices (including grape must and coconut water) and vegetable juices, unfermented and not containing added spirit, whether or not containing added sugar or other sweetening matter

category.description: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and …

vatRateResults.comment: Only selected items - fresh or chilled meat, live fish, fresh or chilled fish, milk, butter, bread and other selected foodstuffs. List can be found in Annex 7 of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax as amended via the following link https://www.mfsr.sk/en/taxes-customs-accounting/indirect-taxes/vat/

code.description: Radioactive elements and isotopes and compounds other than those of subheading 284410, 284420 or 284430; alloys, dispersions (including cermets), ceramic products and mixtures containing these elements, isotopes or compounds; radioactive residues
Saccharin and its salts
Antibiotics
CHAPTER 30 - PHARMACEUTICAL PRODUCTS

category.description: Pharmaceutical products of a kind normally used for health care, prevention of illness and as treatment for medical and veterinary purposes,…

vatRateResults.comment:
Only selected items.
Exhaustive list can be found in Annex 7 of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax as amended via the following link https://www.mfsr.sk/en/taxes-customs-accounting/indirect-taxes/vat/

code.description: Diagnostic or laboratory reagents on a backing, prepared diagnostic or laboratory reagents whether or not on a backing, other than those of heading 3002 or 3006; certified reference materials
Other
Graduated compression hosiery (for example, stockings for varicose veins)
Walking sticks, seat-sticks, whips, riding-crops and the like
Other, presented in the form of systems
Audio-frequency electric amplifiers
Carriages for disabled persons, whether or not motorised or otherwise mechanically propelled
Of carriages for disabled persons
Contact lenses
Spectacle lenses of glass
Spectacle lenses of other materials

Orthopaedic appliances, including crutches, surgical belts and trusses; splints and other fracture appliances; artificial parts of the body; hearing aids and other appliances which are worn or carried, or implanted in the body, to compensate for a defect or disability
Sanitary towels (pads) and tampons, napkins (diapers), napkin liners  and similar articles, of any material

category.description: Medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled, including the repair of such goods

vatRateResults.comment:
Only selected items.
Exhaustive list can be found in Annex 7 of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax as amended via the following link https://www.mfsr.sk/en/taxes-customs-accounting/indirect-taxes/vat/

code.description: Accommodation services

category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment: Accomodation and similar establishements as defined by NACE 55 code. The specific legal definition can be found in Annex 7a of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax. The change is effective as of 1 January 2019. Exhaustive list can be found in Annex 7 of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax as amended via the following link https://www.mfsr.sk/en/taxes-customs-accounting/indirect-taxes/vat/

code.description: Food and beverage serving services

category.description: Restaurant and catering services, it being possible to exclude the supply of (alcoholic and/or non-alcoholic) beverages

vatRateResults.comment: Reduced VAT rate from 20% to 10%  on restaurant services. The reduced rate starts from 01/01/2023 onwards. An exception for all alcoholic beverages was added to the reduced rate of 10% for restaurants. Alcoholic beverages in restaurants to be taxed at a standard rate of 20% since 01/01/2024.

code.description: Printed books, brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, whether or not in single sheets
Appearing at least four times a week
Children's picture, drawing or colouring books
Music, printed or in manuscript, whether or not bound or illustrated

vatRateResults.comment: Printed books, brochures, leaflets and similar printed products, except books, brochures, leaflets and similar printed products, in which advertising and advertising represent, individually or together, more than 50% of the total content of the product. Exhaustive list can be found in Annex 7 of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax as amended via the following link https://www.mfsr.sk/en/taxes-customs-accounting/indirect-taxes/vat/

code.description: Social work services without accommodation

category.description: Supply of goods and services by organisations recognised as being devoted to social wellbeing by Member States and engaged in welfare …

vatRateResults.comment: Supply of goods and services by organisations recognised as being devoted to social wellbeing by Member States and engaged in welfare or social security work, in so far as those transactions are not exempt pursuant to Articles 132, 135 and 136;

code.description: Buildings and building construction works
Constructions and construction works for civil engineering
Real estate services

category.description: Provision, construction, renovation and alteration of housing, as part of a social policy

vatRateResults.comment: Construction of state-supported rental housing within the framework of the state's social policy (includes: delivery of a building or part of a building, including the construction land on which the building or part of the building stands, renovation and reconstruction of the building or part of the building, including construction and assembly work on the building).
